title: The Family: life styles of the future (TEFC)
creator_credit: Hobel-Leiterman Productions, Document Associates, Philip S. Hobel, Douglas Leiterman and Beryl Fox
brief_description: Dr. Margaret Meade, considers the concept of the family. Whilst the nuclear family has predominated in industrial societies, Dr. Meade highlights current developments, including the communal family and the “three-way marriage”. She then progresses into a discussion on the factors that will influence the composition of the family of the future.
